levels.name: Recall
levels.description:
On deployment, view a random selection of <@ba.vup>{range_num}</> units from the <@ba.vup>Recuperation Area</> and select <@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}</> units to be transferred to the Deployment Waiting Zone.
<@ba.rem>After activation, this unit disappears (will not appear again in this battle)</>
